document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">outer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Sky </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Yellower </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">hewn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Saffron </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">vermillion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">slid </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">seam </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">shown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Of yellow was the outer sky
